page.title: 15EDWINSTOWE FAIR
page.content: {Tourists}are pleased to see the bright colours of{Edwinstowe Fair}on the green behind the cricket ground and next to the forest.It is owned by{ {Alfred Turvill}who is 48,was born on the Fair and has lived there ever since.He occasionally moves to other sites for their traditional fairs eg.Mansfield,Warsop and most importantly the{Goose Fair at {Nottingham. { }He packs away for winter but is on the site at Edwinstowe from{March to {September.}He gets bored with changing money and listening to and repairing the machines but he likes the chance to make a profit and to live outside.He built the{arcade}himself in 1975 which he opens at 10.00 and closes at dusk.It is popular with tourists and local children. He like his family before him loves the Fair.
